title: Maximum Experience
description: The United Youth Space Corps Gap Year Program!It was supposed to be a gap year internship with little adventures. The ordinary kind of adventures; safe ones, ones that gave the interns maximum experience credentials but poised only a low level risk to their lives. Your typical traveling the universe doing a series of meet and greets with a scattering of sightseeing and a sprinkling of a few good deeds. Instead, within days of boarding the ship, the interns are floating adrift in space after a virus renders the adult crew in comas. Civilization closes its doors to them. Their story is doomed until a stowaway offers the interns a quest of hope.
author: Misty Dais
